name: Oathrot Wraith
description: The Oathrot Wraith is a spectral figure with an aura of malevolence, often appearing as a shrouded silhouette that drifts through the air, imposing curses upon its foes.
memorable: Its ability to curse and drain life makes encounters with it particularly dangerous, especially for those reliant on their oaths and resolve.
goals: To curse living beings and drain their life force while disrupting their concentration and abilities.
relations: Often associated with other undead or creatures that threaten oaths, such as fiends.
environment: Dark or abandoned places, especially where oaths have been broken or betrayal has occurred.
strengths: Strong against many damage types, immunity to several conditions, and the ability to evade physical attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and has disadvantage in sunlight, making it susceptible to light-based tactics.
attacks: Life Drain melee attack that saps life essence, dealing significant necrotic damage and reducing maximum hit points.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Oathbreaking, which curses enemies and severely hampers their ability to concentrate.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in darkness.
skills: Possesses an average perception skill, making it capable of noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, showcasing its undead nature.
Can pinpoint the location of clerics and paladins nearby, enhancing its threat against divine beings.
Incorporeal movement allows it to pass through objects and creatures effortlessly.
Can impose severe penalties on creatures that fail its curse, particularly during critical moments.
Swaths of darkness and despair often follow its presence.
test_queries: cursing undead found in dark places
wraith that seeks out divine beings
